content:
I am a final-year (2017-2020) master student at East China Normal University under the supervision of Prof. Xuemin Lin. Previously, I received the B.Eng. degree from the same school in 2017.
My research interests lie in Graph Data Management with a focus on Cohesive Subgraph Mining (especially k-core). I will continue to research on Graph Data Management in my doctoral career.
summary: I am a final-year (2017-2020) master student at East China Normal University under the supervision of Prof. Xuemin Lin. Previously, I received the B.Eng. degree from the same school in 2017.
title: Deming Chu
Finding the Best k in Core Decomposition: A Time and Space Optimal Solution

content: Survey and implement existing Cohesive Subgraph Mining algorithms
summary: Survey and implement existing Cohesive Subgraph Mining algorithms
title: Cohesive Subgraph Mining for Anomaly Analysis
